column4: [question] ! I am connected with “ssh -X” to a computer, but when I try to execute a graphical command, it displays “Error: no display specified”
How do I know the number of my display?
probably the DISPLAY environment var isn't set properly
but I don't know what to set
I have tried with DISPLAY=:0.0 firefox, and I guess it has displayed on the remote machine
google ssh and DISPLAY and you'll probably find it
I think you might need the target machine name in it
I'm about 2 days new to ubuntu though
when I ssh -X and echo $DISPLAY  I get localhost:10.0
I will try sth like this
what are you looking for ?  I have "me  :0  datetime (console)"
where 2.2 is the machine i'm at physically
